page.title: 03Flora-by Jennifer Sant
page.content: {In our area,there is an abundance of the more common British flowers, especially along the {road-sides } which are no longer so frequently cut or sprayed.Here cow-parsley,hogweed, dock,willow-herb and many different grasses grow.In the {fields }flowers such as butter-cup,dog-daisy,lady's -smock,thistle,clover,meadow-sweet and sorrel are found.In the {hedge {rows }which enclose the fields red campion,vetch,foxglove,dog-rose, stitchwort,herb Robert and cuckoo- pint flourish.In the many {damp- {places, }water plants such as flag iris,water-lily and bulrush grow in the water itself while pond weed, common rush,spearmint and butter bur are found around its edges.Some rare -r plants are also found such as violet,cowslip,primrose,white campion and wild strawberry which were common.
